analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na vipākam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na vipāka dhamma dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa

original: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
